---
title: "Make Splines"
output: html_notebook
---

# Overhead
```{r overhead, include = FALSE}
packages_vector <- c("lspline", 
                     "tidyverse")

need_to_install <- packages_vector[!(packages_vector %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"])]

if (length(need_to_install)) install.packages(need_to_install)

for (package in packages_vector) {
  library(package, character.only = TRUE)
}

```

# Remote I-O
```{r remote-io}
test_file_name <- "test.csv"

```

# Parameters
```{r parameters}

```

# Data Reads
```{r data-reads}
test_df <- read_csv(test_file_name, col_types = "dd")

```

# Splines
```{r spline}
knots_vector <- c(0.5, 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 20, 30, 50)

model_01 <- lm(test_df$Impedance ~ lspline(test_df$Distance, knots_vector))

outcomes_df <- bind_cols(test_df, tibble(predict = predict(model_01, test_df)))

coeffs_df <- tibble(coeffs = coefficients(model_01))
```

# Write
```{r write}
write_csv(outcomes_df, path = "outcomes.csv")
```
